Abdullah bin Mohammed Ibrahim Al Issa

Description: Riyad Bank is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. It operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across France, Bahrain and Saudi Arabia. Riyad Bank is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 1957.
